author: Ken Moritsugu | AP
title: China moves to block new virus flare-up on Russian border
description: China is facing a new coronavirus flare-up along its remote northern border with Russia, far from the epicenter of Wuhan where it is close to declaring victory in the battle against the pandemic
content: The long, porous border of sprawling Heilongjiang province and neighboring Inner Mongolia has much less travel than major cities like Beijing and Shanghai. But it is a popular alternative route into the country. Many Chinese live and work in Russia, where Chi… [+3927 chars]
